replies: @${screenName} CAPTAIN Jack Sparrow, if you please.
@${screenName} Captain Jack Sparrow, if you please.
@${screenName} There should be a 'Captain' in there somewhere.
@${screenName} That's not nice, you didn't call me 'Captain.'
quotes: Drink up me hearties, yo ho!
Drink up me hearties, yo ho! Yo ho, yo ho, a pirate's life for me! You know this song, parrot? Feel free to join in anytime.
Out of rum. Why? Why are we out of rum?
I always wonder why they call it the Flying Dutchman. I don't get it.
Batten down the hatches, mates, it's gonna get ugly! Relatively speaking.
Hit the deck!
Now, on deck! Batten down the hatches, weigh anchor! We sail... with the tide.
All these beautiful mermaids. Creatures of legend and lore, right in front of me! What an exciting adventure, indeed!
Why is it always magic and curses and metal ships and weird little dolls?
I regret nothing, ever.
Here you are just thinking Jackie's not good enough to be a pirate, why can't he be more like his cousin Valerie, or Grandmama...
So, your ability to remain free resides in the hands of a rum trafficker smitten with the drink.
He who wins the day must buy the drinks. It's traditional.
How odd. Must have words with that first mate of mine. Bit of a loose cannon, he is.
You can keep doing that forever, the dog is NEVER going to move.
Pirate.
The only rules that really matter are these: what a man can do and what a man can't do.
Savvy?
Human hair. From my back.
This shot was not meant for you.
I think we've all arrived at a very special place. Spiritually, ecumenically, grammatically.
I want you to know that I was rooting for you. Know that.
Elizabeth... it would never have worked between us darling. I'm sorry. Will... nice hat.
So we're all men of our word really... except for, of course, Elizabeth, who is in fact, a woman.
A wedding? I love weddings. Drinks all around!
Don't be alarmed, we're taking over the ship.
If you were waiting for the opportune moment, that was it.
Worry about your own fortunes, gentlemen. The deepest circle of hell is reserved for betrayers and mutineers.
So, there is a curse? That's interesting.
That's VERY interesting.
When you marooned me on that god forsaken spit of land, you forgot one very important thing, mate: I'm Captain Jack Sparrow.
But you have heard of me.
Monkey!
You seem somewhat familiar. Have I threatened you before?
Do us a favor... I know it's difficult for you... but please, stay here, and try not to do anything... stupid.
Of the two of us, I am the only one who hasn't committed mutiny, therefore my word is the one we'll be trusting.
Funny ol' world, innit?
Stop blowing holes in my ship!
Commandeer. We're going to commandeer that ship. Nautical term.
Me? I'm dishonest, and a dishonest man you can always trust to be dishonest. Honestly.
It's the honest ones you want to watch out for, because you can never predict when they're going to do something incredibly... stupid.
Not all treasure is silver and gold, mate.
Now... bring me that horizon.
'And really bad eggs.' Drink up me 'earties, yo ho!
No! Not good! Stop! Not good! What are you doing? You burned all the food, the shade... the rum.
Why is the rum gone?
But why is the rum gone?
'Must have been terrible for you to be trapped here Jack. Must have been terrible for you.' Well it bloody is now!
Don't do anything stupid.
Easy on the goods, darling.
No one. He's no one. Distant cousin of my aunt's nephew twice removed. Lovely singing voice. Eunuch.
I'm sorry. It's just... it's such a pretty boat... ship.
Parleley, parlelellyleloooo, par le nee, partner, par... snip, parsley...
That would be the French.
Apparently, there's a leak...
I love this song. Really bad eggs. Ooh.
When I get the Pearl back, I'm gonna teach it to the whole crew, and we'll sing it all the time.
Not just the Spanish Main, love. The entire ocean. The entire wo'ld. Wherever we want to go, we'll go.
You don't want to be doing that, mate.
Your funeral.
That's the second time I've had to watch that man sail away with my ship.
Welcome to the Caribbean, love.
I know those cannons. It's the Pearl.
No survivors? Then where do the stories come from, I wonder?
Pride of the King's navy you are.
Clearly you've never been to Singapore.
You think this wise, boy... crossing blades with a pirate?
No, no, no, by all means kill the whelp. Just not yet. Wait for the opportune moment.
I'm Captain Jack Sparrow. Savvy?
Any man who falls behind, is left behind.
I admire a person who's willing to do whatever's necessary.
Friends! This is the day that you will always remember as the day that
This is the day you will always remember as the day you almost caught Captain Jack Sparrow!
Ta Da Da Dam, Da Da Da Dam.
So we are all men of our word, really. Except for Elizabeth who is in fact a woman.
Dirt. This is a jar of dirt.
Is the jar of dirt going to help?
It's funny what a man will do to forestall his final judgment.
Any idea when Jones might release said terrible beastie?
Where is it? Where is the thump-thump?
Come to join my crew, lad? Welcome aboard!
Hide the rum.
We are very much alike, you and I, I and you... us.
I have every faith in your reconciliatory navigational skills, now where is that monkey, I want to shoot something!
Oi! Fishface! Lose something? Eh? Scungilli!
Got it! Come to negotiate, eh? Have you, you slimy git? Look what I got.
I got a jar of dirt, I got a jar of dirt, and guess what's inside it!
Uh, I say we respect his final wish.
I knew you'd warm up to me eventually.
My eyesight's as good as ever, just so you know.
You're hired!
Ah-ha! So, we've established my proposal as sound in principle. Now, we're just haggling over price.
Shhh.
One word love: curiosity. You long for freedom. You long to do what you want to do because you want it.
'Ello, beastie.
So what's your plan, then?
No, no! More wood! Big fire! I am chief! Want big fire!
She's only a ship, mate.
You mistrust me? Listen, you can mistrust him, trust me.
My compass works fine.
To what do I owe the pleasure of your carbuncle?
Guard the boat, mind the tide... don't touch my dirt.
Now you're not making any sense at all.
What did the bird say?
Is this a dream? I thought not. If it were, there'd be rum.
An undead monkey! Top that!
You smell funny.
Savvy?
I feel sullied and unusual.
Still rooting for you, mate!
Oh bugger.
Why is the rum always gone?
Alas, my children! This is the day you shall always remember as the day that you almost
Captain Jack Sparrow.
My compass is unique.
If we don't have the key, we can't open whatever it is we don't have that it unlocks.
You're not making any sense at all.
Ah! A heading. Set sail in a... uh... a general... that way! direction.
I want my jar of dirt!
'Ello beastie.
Did everyone see that? Because I will *not* be doing it again.
There'll be dangers along the way... firstly mermaids, zombies... Blackbeard.
You've stolen me. And I'm here to take meself back.
I gotta go.
Seeing as how you're still alive, I say it's all been very successful thus far.
Doesn't ring a bell.
That is NOT a compliment.
Mutiny served me well. It gained me an audience with you.
Sweetness!
Why is the Black Pearl in the bottle?
He's even more annoying in miniature.
You're the one who insisted on bringing the bloody mermaid!
The crime in which you have been found guilty of, is being innocent of being Jack Sparrow.
If you had a sister and a dog... I'd choose the dog.
You demonstrated a lot of technique for someone I supposedly corrupted.
It's a dream.
I support the missionary's position.
Face is familiar. Have I... threatened you before?
Death lies before us, as we sail to the Fountain of Youth.
The ship is ours!
Captain, I wish to report a mutiny. I can name fingers and point names.
Your father saved you. Perhaps his soul is now redeemed.
What has become of my Pearl?
If that ship be sunk properly, then its Captain should be sunk with it!
Who's to say I won't live forever, eh? Discoverer of the Fountain of Youth.
It's a pirate's life for me.
Better to not know which moment may be your last.
It's not the destination so much as the journey, they say.
'Ello dad.
Wet... wet again.
Did no one come to save me just because they missed me?
Cuttlefish. Let us not, dear friends, forget our dear friends the cuttlefish... flipping glorious little sausages.
Shoot him and cut out his tongue, then shoot his tongue! And trim that scraggly beard!
Up is down. That's just maddeningly unhelpful. Why are these things never clear?
I prefer rum... Rum's good.
We must fight... to run away!
My vessel is magnificent and fierce and huge-ish. And gone. Why is it gone?
Gentlemen, I wash my hands of this weirdness.
Mate, if you choose to lock your heart away you'll lose it for certain.
You know, for all that pirates are clever-called, we are an unimaginative lot when it comes to naming things.
I once sailed with a geezer lost both his arms and part of his eye.
I leave you people alone for just a minute and look what happens, everything's gone to pot!
My peanut!
We shall have a magnificent garden party, and you're not invited!
Drink up, me hearties, yo ho!
You may throw my hat if you wish.
You add an agreeable sense of the macabre to any delirium.
NOBODY MOVE! I've dropped me brain.
If I may lend a machete to your intellectual thicket.
Now we're being followed by rocks. Never had that one before.
My hands are clean in this, figuratively.
I haven't the face for tentacles. But, immortality has to count for something, eh?
I'm Captain Jack Sparrow!
Just once, I'd like to find a treasure chest that's not had a curse laid upon it! JUST ONCE!
I've had a bad experience with mutinies.
Why can't these Pirate Lords behave themselves?
I'm afraid you have the misfortune of facing Captain Jack Sparrow!
Pirate's life.
Guillotine? Sounds French. I love the French!
Aah! Monkey!
I once knew a Spaniard named, something in Spanish...
Well today's your lucky day. Because I just happen to be Captain Jack Sparrow.
Zola!
Anyone who invokes 'parley' must not be harmed 'til negotiations are complete.
